viewership_numbers.description: [Group by features] Category header for viewership number features

enable_all.description: Tag for enabling all features within a category

summary_all.description: Tag for a category with an 'enable all' button; used when said button is true.

summary_individual.description: Tag for a category with an 'enable all' button; used when said button is false

sidebar_viewers.description: Label for the Twitch sidebar viewer count setting

channel_live_viewcount.description: Label for enabling / disabling viewer counts on a livestream setting

category_viewcount.description: Label for the category viewer count setting

vod_browse_viewcount.description: Label for the viewcount when browsing on the home page / a channel's VODs

currently_live.description: Label for the live viewership numbers under a VOD when watching a VOD from a live channel

channel_page.description: Viewcount displayed on either an offline channel who is hosting, or when viewing the channel of an online channel. In place of 'Watch now with [x] viewers'

featured_stream.description: Label for the viewcount present under the featured stream on the homepage carousel

follower_count_header.description: [Group by features] Category header for follower count settings

browse_header.description: [Group by location]: Category header for browse page settings

tc_ad.description: Label for TwitchCon banner ads setting

subtember_ad.description: Label for subtember banner ads setting

hypetrain_cat.description: [Group by feature]: Category header for hypetrains

todo.description: Message for indicating that a feature hasn't yet been implemented

uptime_cat.description: [Group by feature -- likely to change]: Stream uptime header

by_loc.description: Option for grouping all settings for the extension by location

by_feat.description: Option for grouping all settings for the extension by feature

issue.description: Text asking if a user has found an issue

report_link.description: Link telling people to report a bug

license_tag.description: Text indicating that the extension is licensed under a specific license (in this case the MIT License)

live_text.description: Text displayed in place of a viewcount, indicating a channel is live

watch_now.description: Text displayed on either an offline channel who is hosting, or when viewing the channel of an online channel. In place of 'Watch now with [x] viewers'.

combos_button.description: Label for enabling / disabling the combos button (to the right of a live channel's title)
